00028 #include <SFML/Config.hpp>
00029 
00030 
00031 #ifdef SFML_SYSTEM_MACOS
00032 
00033 #include <CoreFoundation/CoreFoundation.h>
00034 #include <iostream>
00035 #include <cstdio>
00036 
00037 namespace sf
00038 {
00039 namespace priv
00040 {
00051 void InitializeWorkingDirectory(void) __attribute__ ((constructor));
00052 void InitializeWorkingDirectory(void)
00053 {
00054     char PathBuffer[4096];
00055     bool Encoded = false;
00056     
00057     // Get the application bundle
00058     CFBundleRef MainBundle = CFBundleGetMainBundle();
00059     assert(MainBundle != NULL);
00060     
00061     // Get the resource directory URL
00062     CFURLRef ResourceDirectory = CFBundleCopyResourcesDirectoryURL(MainBundle);
00063     assert(ResourceDirectory != NULL);
00064     
00065     // Convert it as absolute URL
00066     CFURLRef AbsoluteURL = CFURLCopyAbsoluteURL(ResourceDirectory);
00067     assert(AbsoluteURL != NULL);
00068     
00069     // Get the path as C string
00070     Encoded = CFURLGetFileSystemRepresentation(AbsoluteURL, true, (UInt8 *)PathBuffer, 4096);
00071     assert(Encoded);
00072     
00073     // Set the working directory
00074     chdir(PathBuffer);
00075     
00076     CFRelease(AbsoluteURL);
00077     CFRelease(ResourceDirectory);
00078 }
00079 
00080 } // namespace priv
00081 
00082 } // namespace sf
00083 
00084 
00085 #endif // SFML_SYSTEM_MACOS
